scripts.test: npm run --workspace backend test -- && npm run frontend:test
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix backend --no-fund --no-audit --no-progress && npm install --prefix frontend --no-fund --no-audit --no-progress
scripts.verify:types: npm -w backend run typecheck && npm -w frontend run typecheck
scripts.verify:lint: npm -w backend run lint && npm -w frontend run lint
scripts.verify:audit: npm -w backend run osv && npm -w backend run npm-audit
scripts.verify:tests: npm -w backend run test:ci && npm -w frontend run test:ci
scripts.verify:sbom: npm -w backend run sbom && npm -w backend run trivy
scripts.verify:all: npm run verify:types && npm run verify:lint && npm run verify:tests && npm run verify:mutation && npm run verify:audit && npm run verify:api-fuzz && npm run verify:zap && npm run verify:perf && npm run verify:migrate && npm run verify:licenses && npm run verify:sbom && npm run verify:smoke
